valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 13 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 14 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low expected 200 miles west of Rockall 980 by 0600 Sunday. Low Malin 992 losing its identity
